name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control
display_help: Electricity leaps and sparks at your command. You can use raw electrical power to paralyze, knockdown and drain the endurance of foes.

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Electric_Fence
powers.display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay and bringing down fliers. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 6.12 energy damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 6.12 energy damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
5 ticks of 17.73 energy damage over 9.2s on target
4 ticks of -1.10 endurance over 6.2s on target
5 ticks of 8.87 energy damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
20.00% chance for 1.0 immobilize for 18.63s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Tesla_Cage
powers.display_help: Tesla Cage confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 16.76s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Chain_Fences
powers.display_help: You can immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor damage to all foes in range and draining some endurance. This power also reduces Flight capacity in targets. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Foe Immobilize, -End, -Fly

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 30 ft. radius (16 targets max)

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 immobilize for 18.63s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Jolting_Chain
powers.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged Chain AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, -End

display_info: Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Stunning_Aura
powers.display_help: While this power is active, the air around you becomes charged with electricity, leaping out and shocking foes that get too close. Foes will lose some endurance, while you gain Recovery and Regeneration per target hit. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 20 ft. radius (8 targets max)

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Static_Field
powers.display_help: You can build up a Static Field at a nearby location. Any foes in the field may lose control of their muscles due to the static charge, and will shake violently. Foes may also be drained of some endurance, and some of that endurance may be transferred to nearby allies. Any attack will interrupt the effect temporarily and foes will re-gain control, although their movement and attack rates will be reduced. This effect can last for some time, and will continue to paralyze foes in the field. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Paralyzing_Blast
powers.display_help: Summoning a large amount of energy, you can completely paralyze a group of foes in cages of electricity for a short time. These foes may be drained of some endurance as well. Recharge: Long

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 30 ft. radius (16 targets max)

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 11.17s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Synaptic_Overload
powers.display_help: This power can subtly scramble the synapses of any target affected, causing hallucinations and confusion amongst foes. The electric charge lasts for some time, and will jump slowly to other opponents causing wide spread confusion. Foes may not be aware that this has happened, and will not be alerted to your presence. You will also not receive experience for any damage dealt by confused opponents. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.0 confuse for 18.63s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Electric_Control.Gremlins
powers.display_help: Mastery over electricity allows you to create almost sentient elementals of lightning. These elementals are mischievous in nature, and enjoy creating havoc and interfering with electronic equipment or magical cantrips. They also never work alone, where there is one Gremlin, there is often another nearby. Recharge: Long
